name: Dev/QA Installations
title: Dev/QA Installations
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/1299316749 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

The following installations are in use for either development or quality assurance purposes:

The Tenant should be a logical grouping of installations to simulate the sharing of resources like API Tokens, the User Group and a similar user pool.

In addition also local installations may be used by developers, they either have a domain name from Efferen2 like https://master-meinusch.dev2.qb-feedback.com or point to localhost using a unique name
